services.sports_activities_notes: Listed externally as available amenity. Said must confirm what activities are offered.

policies.check_in_notes: Source: OTA listings (booking.com policy, destinia). Confirmed by internal check-in-out.json.
policies.check_out_notes: Updated to 12:00 per Omar decision 2026-02-20. Source: Expedia Partner Central Step 3.
policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before 18:00 on check-in day. Late cancellation or no-show: 1st night + applicable taxes. Timezone: GMT (Casablanca). Source: Expedia Partner Central Step 3, 2026-02-20.
policies.children_policy: Children allowed. Ages 2-12: €30/person/night when using existing bed. Source: OTA policy data.
policies.pets_policy: Not allowed. Source: Omar confirmation 2026-02-21; corroborated by Booking.com and Expedia Step 4.
